news.headline: New Engineering Projects Launched
news.summary: The Civil Engineering Student Chapter has initiated projects focusing on infrastructure sustainability.
news.author: John Doe

news.headline: Guest Lecture: Future of Urban Design
news.summary: Renowned architect Maria Santos shared insights on sustainable urban planning.
news.author: Jane Smith

news.headline: New Chapter Leadership Elected
news.summary: The annual elections concluded with Anna Cruz being elected as the new chapter president.
news.author: Emily Davis

news.headline: Volunteering at Community Building Project
news.summary: Students volunteered in building a community center in Barangay Mabini.
news.author: Michael Johnson

news.headline: Civil Engineering Week Kicks Off
news.summary: The week-long celebration of Civil Engineering Week starts with workshops and seminars.
news.author: Chris Brown

news.headline: Scholarship Opportunities for CE Students
news.summary: New scholarships are now available for aspiring civil engineers. Application deadlines approaching soon.
news.author: Anna Cruz

news.headline: Field Trip to the New Bridge Construction Site
news.summary: Students had the opportunity to visit the construction site of the new highway bridge.
news.author: John Doe

news.headline: Engineering Competition Winners Announced
news.summary: The Civil Engineering student team won the first prize at the regional engineering competition.
news.author: Jane Smith

news.headline: Fundraising Event for Community Projects
news.summary: A successful fundraising event was held to support ongoing community infrastructure projects.
news.author: Emily Davis

news.headline: Technical Workshop: Bridge Design Fundamentals
news.summary: A technical workshop was conducted to explore the fundamentals of bridge design.
news.author: Michael Johnson
